response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique offering holds immense value and is worth $1,000,000 to us. We are confident it will bring you unparalleled benefits and returns equivalent to its worth.

To make this acquisition possible, we are extending a special offer to you. For a limited time only, we are willing to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a fraction of its original cost.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, we are prepared to facilitate a smooth transaction and ensure a seamless experience throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
